Posts.Content: rwalton5 wrote: Hi all,  I found a rather large lump in my right top breast this morning.  I don't think it has been there long, but it is there none the less.  I have had really sore nipples the last couple of weeks but thought this was due to my having a hysterectomy and maybe my hormones being a bit out of balance.  I still have ovaries.  I do not know if this is related to hormones or if it is something that I should actually get checked out or will it just go away?  When is when to get seen or to just ride it out and see if it is just nothing.  Not sure what to do. A bit scared.  Breast cancer runs in my family.  Had a mamogram about 6 months ago and it was fine.  What to do? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lump in right breast rwalton5 lsfchicago
